婣字的基本解释

婣
yīn
同“姻”。

婣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yīn］
［《廣韻》於真切，平真，影。］
亦作“婣1”。
(1)结亲的男家，指夫或夫之父。
(2)妻或妻之父。
(3)泛指由婚姻关系结成的亲戚。
(4)对姻亲亲爱。
(5)婚姻；结亲。

婣字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　婣； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页265第11
【集韻】同姻。

婣
Basic explanation of words
婣
yīn
Same as "marriage."
婣
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yīn］
["Guangyun" is true, plain, and shadowy. ]
Also known as "婣1".
(1) The married male family refers to the husband or the father of the husband.
(2) Wife or wife's father.
(3) Broadly refers to relatives formed by marriage.
(4) Be dear to the in-laws.
(5) Marriage; marriage.
婣
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　婣; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 265 No. 11
【Jiyun】Same marriage.
